name: BuyHTTP Super Polls
author: BuyHTTP

sections.description:
Use this plugin to create and manage polls you can put anywhere on your site with a widget. Features:

  • Widget for placing polls
  • [bsp_show_results] shortcode for displaying poll results
  • Easy administration of new polls and options
  • Fully translatable
sections.installation:
• Install and activate plugin
  • Go to Pages > Add New and create a new page with the [bsp_show_results] shortcode
  • Go to Settings > BSP Settings and enter the ID for the page you created
  • Go to Plugins > Manage BSP and create your first poll
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Hard limit of 25 options per poll due to limit of colors for chart
  • Fix: Poll options not removed when switching between polls
  • Auto focus on input field when adding new options
  • Select between doughnut, pie, and radar chart types
  • Stanrdardized display and added bulk delete

1.0.1

  • Added stripsplashes to all question and option views
  • Fix: oneVotePerIp was applied to all polls, not just the one poll

short_description: Easily create and manage polls for your site. Then display results in a post or page.
